title.rendered: How Can Women Over 40 Lose Weight?

content.rendered:
How Can Women Over 40 Lose Weight?

How Can Women Over 40 
Lose Weight?

Women between 40-55 years old deal with declining hormones, causing weight gain around the mid section. 

How do we combat that?

Swipe Up

Have the right MINDSET

Understand WHY you 
need to lose weight.

Focus on your overall HEALTH

#1

Swipe Up

Understand HORMONAL Changes

Low Estrogen slows down your metabolism.

Focus on healthy foods 
that boost estrogen.

#2

Swipe Up

Choose Your Diet WISELY

Low-Carb Diet: reduce overal carbs and sugar

Balanced Diet: eat a 
variety of nutrient-dense foods

#3

Swipe Up

Watch Your Eating HABITS

Consider Intermittent Fasting

Portion Control

#4

Swipe Up

Move your way to fitness

Muscle Loss accelerates 
as we age

Exercise to maintain lean muscle

#5

Swipe Up

Count your zzz’s.

A LACK of sleep makes 
you hungry.

Try to get at least 7 hours

#6

Swipe Up

Change Your Unhealthy Lifestyle

Dump the junk food 
and sodas

Form new, healthy habits

#7

Swipe Up

Have a concrete PLAN

“Failing to plan 
is planning to fail.”

#7

Swipe Up

Tap the below link for more details on how to lose weight after 40!

Swipe Up
